name: Stickers Jungle
short_description: Play with jungle stickers to develop your logic and attention! Move the stickers onto the correct silhouettes. Many different settings, colorful objects and 13 cute animals are waiting for you! Learning has never been so fun!
long_description: Play with jungle stickers to develop your logic and attention! Move the stickers onto the correct silhouettes. Many different settings, colorful objects and 13 cute animals are waiting for you! Learning has never been so fun!

name: Jigsaw Puzzles
short_description: Play with jungle puzzles to develop your logic and attention! Put the pieces of the puzzle in the right place and to meet many cute animals! 13 different jungle animals, 13 different environments and lots of fun are waiting for you!
long_description: Play with jungle puzzles to develop your logic and attention! Put the pieces of the puzzle in the right place and to meet many cute animals! 13 different jungle animals, 13 different environments and lots of fun are waiting for you!

name: Christmas
short_description: Count in the snowy jungle! Santa's hats, packages and gifts, colorful decorations and cute jungle animals are waiting for you to learn and have fun in the snow! You can practice correctly counting from 1 to 10 in 4 different settings.
long_description: Count in the snowy jungle! Santa's hats, packages and gifts, colorful decorations and cute jungle animals are waiting for you to learn and have fun in the snow! You can practice counting correctly from 1 to 10 in 4 different environments. Just drag the objects and click on the yellow button to find out if you counted correctly. Learning has never been so much fun.

name: Colouring
short_description: Color the farm animals! Match the colors correctly and have fun! Come and learn to recognize colors with the cow, horse and their friends! 8 animals and 8 settings to learn to recognize and match colors.
long_description: Color the farm animals! Match the colors correctly and have fun! Come and learn to recognize colors with the cow, horse and their friends! 8 animals and 8 settings to learn to recognize and match colors.

name: Find the hidden object
short_description: Dive into an ocean of fun and train your observation skills! Search for all the hidden objects in the sea! The fish, octopus and starfish look for their precious objects, help them find everything! Look! Strange objects are hidden among algae and corals!
long_description: Dive into an ocean of fun and train your observation skills! Search for all the hidden objects in the sea! The fish, octopus and starfish look for their precious objects, help them find everything! Look! Strange objects are hidden among algae and corals!

name: Logical pairings
short_description: Watch and have fun! Choose from three games: guess what the animals eat, which footprint belongs to each animal and which animal is in the close-up. Learn more about animals while you watch, learn and have fun!
long_description: Watch and have fun! Choose from three games: guess what the animals eat, which footprint belongs to each animal and which animal is in the close up. Learn more about animals while you watch, learn and have fun!

name: Carnival
short_description: Reassemble all the carnival costumes! Choose your favorite character and start playing! Sharpen your eyes and find the right element to complete the costume and be ready to celebrate the carnival! So many funny costumes are waiting for you!
long_description: Reassemble all the carnival costumes! Choose your favorite character and start playing! Sharpen your eyes and find the right element to complete the costume and be ready to celebrate the carnival! So many funny costumes are waiting for you!

name: Learn English
short_description: Listen to more than 70 English words in three different categories. Choose the category you would like or listen to them all. When you are ready, you can challenge yourself with quizzes. How many new words will you learn?
long_description: Listen to more than 70 English words in three different categories. Covering animals, food and objects, there are more than 20 words in each category to expand your English vocabulary. Choose the category you would like or listen to them all. When you are ready, you can challenge yourself with quizzes. How many new words will you learn?

name: Spot the difference
short_description: Look carefully! Some things are different between the two pictures: find all the differences! It takes great concentration to find the differences between two seemingly identical images, but with commitment and attention you will find them all!
long_description: Look carefully! Some things are different between the two pictures: find all the differences! It takes great concentration to find the differences between two seemingly identical images, but with commitment and attention you will find them all!

name: Counting on the sea bed
short_description: Count under the sea! Dolphins, pufferfish, moray eels and lobsters will guide you into the fantastic world of mathematics! In 9 different environments you can practice counting correctly from 1 to 10. Play with mathematics!
long_description: Count under the sea! Dolphins, pufferfish, moray eels and lobsters will guide you into the fantastic world of mathematics! In 9 different environments you can practice counting correctly from 1 to 10. Choose your favorite animal and count how many of them swim under the sea. Every time you play with one of them, the number of animals in the picture will change, to help you learn more and more!

name: Listen and Learn
short_description: Train your ears! Choose between animals and musical instruments. A sound is associated with each drawing. Listen to them all and then challenge yourself with quizzes. Guess which animal or musical instrument the sound you hear belongs to!
long_description: Train your ears! Choose between animals and musical instruments. A sound is associated with each drawing. Listen to them all and then challenge yourself with quizzes. Guess which animal or musical instrument the sound you hear belongs to!

name: Ocean Stickers
short_description: Play with ocean stickers to develop your logic and attention! Move the stickers onto the correct silhouettes. There are many different settings, colorful objects and 16 cute animals waiting for you under the sea!
long_description: Play with ocean stickers to develop your logic and attention! Move the stickers onto the correct silhouettes. There are many different settings, colorful objects and 16 cute animals waiting for you under the sea!

name: Laddu Champion
short_description:
Food is swinging gently from a rope. To score a slam dunk, time the Laddu's release to make it fall nicely into the basket.

How many perfect catches can you make? 

Features:

- A fun theme, perfect for outdoor
- Unlimited levels for unlimited gameplay
- Bonus points for factors such as speed, ricochets, and accuracy
- Beautiful street scene
- A variety of obstacles such as bouncers and spikes, to make things challenging
- Stuck? Earn coins to purchase magnets and springs to help
- Interactive tutorial to learn the ropes
long_description:
Food is swinging gently from a rope. To score a slam dunk, time the Laddu's release to make it fall nicely into the basket.

How many perfect catches can you make? 

Features:

- A fun theme, perfect for outdoor
- Unlimited levels for unlimited gameplay
- Bonus points for factors such as speed, ricochets, and accuracy
- Beautiful street scene
- A variety of obstacles such as bouncers and spikes, to make things challenging
- Stuck? Earn coins to purchase magnets and springs to help
- Interactive tutorial to learn the ropes

name: Ludo Hero
short_description:
Ludo Hero, modern version of the royal game of Pachisi has arrived. It's a game which was played among Indian kings and queens in ancient times. 

Roll the Ludo dice and move your tokens to reach the center of the Ludo board. Beat other opponents and become the king of Ludo in this multiplayer game.

No complicated login screens. Just enter your username and play against the world.

Play with your friends in a 2-player or 4-player mode.

Features:

- Chat with your friends in real-time
- Feeling lazy? Use the autoplay function
- Server side cheat detection
- Play online against friends or offline against bots or computers
long_description:
Ludo Hero, modern version of the royal game of Pachisi has arrived. It's a game which was played among Indian kings and queens in ancient times. 

Roll the Ludo dice and move your tokens to reach the center of the Ludo board. Beat other opponents and become the king of Ludo in this multiplayer game.

No complicated login screens. Just enter your username and play against the world.

Play with your friends in a 2-player or 4-player mode.

Features:

- Chat with your friends in real-time
- Feeling lazy? Use the autoplay function
- Server side cheat detection
- Play online against friends or offline against bots or computers

name: How Smart Are You?
short_description:
How smart are you? Answer random trivia questions ranging from broad topics such as popular culture, internet technology, geography, music, history and more. 

Features:

- Simple and responsive design, suitable for customizations.
- Are you smarter than a 5th grader? 
- Simple and clean design. Great for reskins.
- Full screen mode
long_description:
How smart are you? Answer random trivia questions ranging from broad topics such as popular culture, internet technology, geography, music, history and more. 

Features:

- Simple and responsive design, suitable for customizations.
- Are you smarter than a 5th grader? 
- Simple and clean design. Great for reskins.
- Full screen mode

name: Jumpee Land
short_description:
Play as a curious yellow 3d bird, jumping from one platform to the next.

Avoid the lasers! 

Time your jumps, avoid traps such as breaking tiles, and face the ever changing landscape coming your way.

How far can you go?

Features:

- Fun and quirky theme
- Interactive tutorial
- Unlock other animal characters
long_description:
Play as a curious yellow 3d bird, jumping from one platform to the next.

Avoid the lasers! 

Time your jumps, avoid traps such as breaking tiles, and face the ever changing landscape coming your way.

How far can you go?

Features:

- Fun and quirky theme
- Interactive tutorial
- Unlock other animal characters

name: Ludo With Friends
short_description:
Ludo with Friends is the modern version of the royal game of Pachisi. It's a game which was played among Indian kings and queens in ancient times. 

Roll the Ludo dice and move your tokens to reach the center of the Ludo board. Beat other opponents and become the king of Ludo in this multiplayer game.

No complicated login screens. Just enter your username and play against the world.

Play with your friends in a 2-player or 4-player mode.

Features:

- Chat with your friends in real-time
- Feeling lazy? Use the autoplay function
- Server side cheat detection
- Play online against friends or offline against bots or computers
long_description:
Ludo with Friends is the modern version of the royal game of Pachisi. It's a game which was played among Indian kings and queens in ancient times. 

Roll the Ludo dice and move your tokens to reach the center of the Ludo board. Beat other opponents and become the king of Ludo in this multiplayer game.

No complicated login screens. Just enter your username and play against the world.

Play with your friends in a 2-player or 4-player mode.

Features:

- Chat with your friends in real-time
- Feeling lazy? Use the autoplay function
- Server side cheat detection
- Play online against friends or offline against bots or computers

name: World of Words
short_description:
How good is your vocabulary? Find and match words in the English dictionary. Score points and coins for each correct match.

Win the level by matching the golden word. Travel from New York, to London, to Tokyo while solving word puzzles!


Features:



Fun and inspiring theme.
Innovative tap and drag mechanic, to form words. Form words forwards and backwards!
Interactive tutorial to learn the ropes.
Earn coins solving word puzzles.
Use coins to purchase powerups (shuffle, switch, rotate, clear row).
Unlimited replayability. Word puzzles are chosen at random each time.
Over 30 engaging levels, each with a unique twist
long_description:
How good is your vocabulary? Find and match words in the English dictionary. Score points and coins for each correct match.

Win the level by matching the golden word. Travel from New York, to London, to Tokyo while solving word puzzles!


Features:



Fun and inspiring theme.
Innovative tap and drag mechanic, to form words. Form words forwards and backwards!
Interactive tutorial to learn the ropes.
Earn coins solving word puzzles.
Use coins to purchase powerups (shuffle, switch, rotate, clear row).
Unlimited replayability. Word puzzles are chosen at random each time.
Over 30 engaging levels, each with a unique twist

name: London Jigsaw Puzzle
short_description:
Arrange the jigsaw pieces of famous landmarks in London. 

Solve puzzles of famous sights such as the London Eye, Big Ben, Tower of London, Buckingham Palace, Hyde Park, Trafalgar Square, Westminster Abbey and more.

Features:

- Modern instagram type design, suitable for a young and millennial audience.
- Hints system.
- Zoom function to zoom out.
- Modify the number of pieces each row or column.
- Select different backgrounds to work on.
- Peaceful theme and music.
long_description:
Arrange the jigsaw pieces of famous landmarks in London. 

Solve puzzles of famous sights such as the London Eye, Big Ben, Tower of London, Buckingham Palace, Hyde Park, Trafalgar Square, Westminster Abbey and more.

Features:

- Modern instagram type design, suitable for a young and millennial audience.
- Hints system.
- Zoom function to zoom out.
- Modify the number of pieces each row or column.
- Select different backgrounds to work on.
- Peaceful theme and music.

name: Math Trivia LIVE
short_description:
How fast can you calculate math in your head? Hurry up, because your opponent is doing the same!

In this rapid-fire math quiz, the player who scores the most after 10 rounds wins!

Play against anyone around the world on their smartphone, tablet device or computer.

Features:

- Randomly generated questions
- 10 questions per round
- Fun trivia theme and environment
- Avatar selection
- Play against humans or practice against bots
long_description:
How fast can you calculate math in your head? Hurry up, because your opponent is doing the same!

In this rapid-fire math quiz, the player who scores the most after 10 rounds wins!

Play against anyone around the world on their smartphone, tablet device or computer.

Features:

- Randomly generated questions
- 10 questions per round
- Fun trivia theme and environment
- Avatar selection
- Play against humans or practice against bots

name: Happy Crayons
short_description:
It's time to express your creativity in this coloring book. 

Features:

- Easy to use interface, suitable for kids
- Never color outside the lines!
- Many templates to choose from. Work with Snail, Butterfly, Turtle, Fish, Beach ball, Teddy Bear, Alphabet blocks, Candy, Ice Cream, Donut, and sweets
- Choose from different brush sizes and colours
- Use the eraser to remove unwanted colors
- Save your work and print pictures with it. Suitable for classrooms.
- Positive theme, to foster good vibes via colouring
long_description:
It's time to express your creativity in this coloring book. 

Features:

- Easy to use interface, suitable for kids
- Never color outside the lines!
- Many templates to choose from. Work with Snail, Butterfly, Turtle, Fish, Beach ball, Teddy Bear, Alphabet blocks, Candy, Ice Cream, Donut, and sweets
- Choose from different brush sizes and colours
- Use the eraser to remove unwanted colors
- Save your work and print pictures with it. Suitable for classrooms.
- Positive theme, to foster good vibes via colouring

name: Monkey Multiple
short_description:
Mr. Monkey, is here to help your kid with multiplying numbers! Easily test your kid, with minimal supervision required. Simple, repeatable and highly addictive.

Perfect for self or group learning in the classroom. Help your kids master math!
long_description:
Mr. Monkey, is here to help your kid with multiplying numbers! Easily test your kid, with minimal supervision required. Simple, repeatable and highly addictive.

Perfect for self or group learning in the classroom. Help your kids master math!

name: Giant Rabbit Run
short_description:
Bunnie just got supersized.

Switch lanes, jump and slide to avoid obstacles such as roadblocks and cars. Collect coins and easter eggs along the way. 

Use coins to purchase cool items, such as a skateboard, rocket pack and a magic carpet!

How far can you run?

Features:

- Revolutionary first person 3D-like view
- Fun theme and music
- Easy and intuitive controls
- Extremely cute rabbit ( happens to be a really big bunny )
- Endless runner
- A shop with items to unlock

Note: The desktop version uses keyboard controls. The mobile version uses easy touch/drag controls.
long_description:
Bunnie just got supersized.

Switch lanes, jump and slide to avoid obstacles such as roadblocks and cars. Collect coins and easter eggs along the way. 

Use coins to purchase cool items, such as a skateboard, rocket pack and a magic carpet!

How far can you run?

Features:

- Revolutionary first person 3D-like view
- Fun theme and music
- Easy and intuitive controls
- Extremely cute rabbit ( happens to be a really big bunny )
- Endless runner
- A shop with items to unlock

Note: The desktop version uses keyboard controls. The mobile version uses easy touch/drag controls.

name: New York Jigsaw Puzzle
short_description:
Arrange the jigsaw pieces together to form New York City landmarks. 

Solve puzzles of famous sights such as the Empire State building, Brooklyn Bridge, Central Park, Yellow Cabs, Downtown Manhattan and more.

Features:

- Modern instagram type design
- Hints system
- Zoom function to zoom out
- Modify the number of pieces each row or column
- Select different backgrounds to work on
- Peaceful theme and music
long_description:
Arrange the jigsaw pieces together to form New York City landmarks. 

Solve puzzles of famous sights such as the Empire State building, Brooklyn Bridge, Central Park, Yellow Cabs, Downtown Manhattan and more.

Features:

- Modern instagram type design
- Hints system
- Zoom function to zoom out
- Modify the number of pieces each row or column
- Select different backgrounds to work on
- Peaceful theme and music

name: My Pet Clinic
short_description:
Our pet clinic is very busy today. We've got cats, dogs, turtles, rabbits and parrots needing your medical attention.

As the pet doctor, treat each pet with the right medicine and tools. Things you will need to do include:

- removing stubborn ticks from dog fur
- giving eye drop solutions to cats
- cleaning and buffing turtle shells
- adding crutches to wounded parrots

Interested in becoming a vet? This is your chance.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Feeling stuck? Our hints will make sure you're able to heal the pets in no time
- Extremely cute looking pets
- Happy and positive sounds for inspiration
long_description:
Our pet clinic is very busy today. We've got cats, dogs, turtles, rabbits and parrots needing your medical attention.

As the pet doctor, treat each pet with the right medicine and tools. Things you will need to do include:

- removing stubborn ticks from dog fur
- giving eye drop solutions to cats
- cleaning and buffing turtle shells
- adding crutches to wounded parrots

Interested in becoming a vet? This is your chance.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Feeling stuck? Our hints will make sure you're able to heal the pets in no time
- Extremely cute looking pets
- Happy and positive sounds for inspiration

name: Spidey Swing
short_description:
It's the adventures of Spidey. Shoot webs, grab on and swing like a spider pro. Avoid things such as sharp edges, rotating chainsaws, arrows, mace and other deadly objects.

Keep the majority of your body parts intact, and get to the finish line. Keep our beloved Spidey alive!

Features
- Interactive tutorial
- Touch, keyboard and  mouse controls
- City skyscraper theme
- Over 24 extremely challenging levels. Test your spider-man skills.
- Presence of blood and gore (can be turned off by request)
- Fans of spiderman and marvel superheroes will love the game
long_description:
It's the adventures of Spidey. Shoot webs, grab on and swing like a spider pro. Avoid things such as sharp edges, rotating chainsaws, arrows, mace and other deadly objects.

Keep the majority of your body parts intact, and get to the finish line. Keep our beloved Spidey alive!

Features
- Interactive tutorial
- Touch, keyboard and  mouse controls
- City skyscraper theme
- Over 24 extremely challenging levels. Test your spider-man skills.
- Presence of blood and gore (can be turned off by request)
- Fans of spiderman and marvel superheroes will love the game

name: Pocket Pac
short_description:
Don't let the monsters catch you! Eat as many dots as you can.

Use arrow keys to move around the maze. Make sharp turns to avoid the monsters. Plan your route you never get trapped!

Collect super dots to fight back against the monsters.

How many points can you score?

Features:

- New and improved maze.
- Fun arcade theme.
- Keyboard controls for desktop.
- Touch controls for mobile.
- Collect fruits for extra points
- Fans of pacman / pac-man will love the game
long_description:
Don't let the monsters catch you! Eat as many dots as you can.

Use arrow keys to move around the maze. Make sharp turns to avoid the monsters. Plan your route you never get trapped!

Collect super dots to fight back against the monsters.

How many points can you score?

Features:

- New and improved maze.
- Fun arcade theme.
- Keyboard controls for desktop.
- Touch controls for mobile.
- Collect fruits for extra points
- Fans of pacman / pac-man will love the game

name: Picture Slide
short_description:
A classic picture slide game. Can you complete the puzzles in the shortest amount of time?

Features

- Easy, medium and hard modes
- Solve all kinds of pictures include animals, food, scenery, cities and objects
- Simple design to encourage focus
- Multiple puzzles to try
- Relaxed environment
long_description:
A classic picture slide game. Can you complete the puzzles in the shortest amount of time?

Features

- Easy, medium and hard modes
- Solve all kinds of pictures include animals, food, scenery, cities and objects
- Simple design to encourage focus
- Multiple puzzles to try
- Relaxed environment

name: Nerd Quiz
short_description:
Take the ultimate nerd test. Find out what percentage nerd you are.

Wow yourself (and your friends) about how nerdy you are. Cover interesting topics such as Reddit, Marvel, Comic Con, Harry Potter, Game of Thrones, Twitch and popular subculture.

Features:

- Fun nerdy artwork and theme
- Randomized questions
- Comtemporary nerd questions involving the latest in internet and fandom culture
- Easy one touch controls to play the quiz
long_description:
Take the ultimate nerd test. Find out what percentage nerd you are.

Wow yourself (and your friends) about how nerdy you are. Cover interesting topics such as Reddit, Marvel, Comic Con, Harry Potter, Game of Thrones, Twitch and popular subculture.

Features:

- Fun nerdy artwork and theme
- Randomized questions
- Comtemporary nerd questions involving the latest in internet and fandom culture
- Easy one touch controls to play the quiz

name: Whack A Mole
short_description:
Whack as many moles as you can, within 15 seconds.

Earn extra time by hitting hard-hat moles.

Magician moles get you extra points.

Don't whack the bomb!

PS: If you're good, the boss mole will reveal itself.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Boss round
- Fun theme and fast paced
- Statistics such as percentage accuracy, hit rate and more.
- Fans of whac a mole will enjoy this. Relive your amusement park experience.
long_description:
Whack as many moles as you can, within 15 seconds.

Earn extra time by hitting hard-hat moles.

Magician moles get you extra points.

Don't whack the bomb!

PS: If you're good, the boss mole will reveal itself.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Boss round
- Fun theme and fast paced
- Statistics such as percentage accuracy, hit rate and more.
- Fans of whac a mole will enjoy this. Relive your amusement park experience.

name: Cosmolander
short_description: Cosmolander offers the opportunity to take an unprecedented interstellar educational trip. It is aimed at children ages 6 and over who love space and astronomy, and is also perfect for those who have never set foot outside our planet!
long_description:
"Cosmolander" is a journey through the solar system, a fantastic adventure for children and young adults in which they can learn whilst having fun. Try catapulting into space to learn about the wonders of the planets and the sun, see how they move and enrich your knowledge with interesting facts and discoveries. Its friendly interface and the narrator's voice will guide you through space. Begin this intergalactic educational journey and you will be able to: 
- EXPLORE the individual planets to learn more about them and study their characteristics, all thanks to 4 detailed sections (structure, satellites, interesting facts and journeys and discoveries). 
- PLAY carrying out of the various Missions for each planet with your spaceship. 
- DISCOVER interesting facts and information about the planets through quizzes that allow you to undertake a secret mission on the planet of your choice.

name: Street Music Academy
short_description: Who said that to learn music you need a musical instrument? With Street Music Academy every object is perfect for unleashing the rocker in you! Bottles, boxes, shoe laces, skateboards, glass bottles and even your belly will be your instruments.
long_description: Street Music Academy is the right tool for igniting your passion for music! Immerse yourself in a real-life game, where street objects come alive with rhythm and musicality. Achieve perfection! Listen and reproduce the thumping musical sequences that challenge your sense of rhythm. Getting 3 stars and becoming a rock star is your only goal! Not just a game for children. Ideal for learning to recognize and reproduce notes, rhythms and melodies, it stimulates coordination and memory. The practical and intuitive approach of "Street Music Academy" will help you explore a new world of entertainment and music.

name: Doctor Justabout
short_description: Doctor Justabout is an extraordinary journey of discovery through the human body, designed for children. A fun and educational app that teaches how the systems and organs of the body work, with lots of interesting facts and fun animations.
long_description: You will get to know the eccentric Doctor Justabout with whom you will enjoy discovering his patients' ""strange illnesses"", helping them to recover through fun games. Start discovering the human body as a machine, you can:  - EXPLORE the various systems, to understand how they work and discover the secrets of our body through lively animations, after choosing your favorite character from Sarah, Anna, Mark and John  - ACCESS either the '' X rays"" section to discover the skeletal and muscular system by moving around a magnifying glass or the ''Advice'' section that is rich in information on hygiene, nutrition and physical activity  - PLAY with Doctor Justabout challenge yourself with fun quizzes. At his clinic, discover the bizarre illnesses of his patients whom you will have to cure by literally entering their systems.

name: Arthur in London
short_description: Travelling with Arthur is the right app for traveling the world in a single tap! Traveling and learning about new cultures helps you grow and learn. With the London games and its unusual features you can enjoy an unprecedented virtual travel experience.
long_description: Arthur and Mambo have been friends for a long time; they met in a rather bizarre way: getting their luggage mixed up in an old station! From that moment onwards, they have been inseparable. Their common love of traveling and discovering new places will ensure both they and you experience exciting adventures! In this app we will take you to the magnicent city of London. You will discover so many unusual things and for every major attraction there will be a different game that will make you feel like real tourists.

name: Hexaparty
short_description: Are you looking for a stimulating game? With Hexaparty colours, you relax and have fun! With Hexaparty you can create fantastic drawings without having to be an artist! Colouring in has never been this easy! Just relax and have fun!
long_description: Hexaparty is the first game of Hexel Art for kids. With this beautiful app you can create fantastic drawings without having to be an artist! The hexels will guide you towards perfection - every design will be a masterpiece! Colouring is a relaxing activity that frees the mind.

name: Math Tales The Ocean
short_description: Every year the Oceanics are held in the ocean: fantastic Olympic Games... underwater! They need your help getting everything ready for the competitions! Follow the rhyme and help count, add and reorder! Who said that learning should be boring?
long_description: Children practice counting and counting down, drawing and learning complex geometric shapes and logical associations, all while having tons of fun! Accompanied by a narrator, the rhymes will catapult children into a fantastic world where ocean animals are organizing Olympic Games and each of them needs help to complete a task: writing numbers on sports vests, placing obstacles on tracks or counting down before the start of a race.

name: Fun Farm Animals
short_description: You’ll never get bored with the farm animals! Many activities are waiting for you, 4 games for each of the 8 farm animals. You can color, solve puzzles, use colorful stickers and listen to animal sounds!
long_description: You’ll never get bored with the farm animals! Many activities are waiting for you, 4 games for each of the 8 farm animals. You can color, solve puzzles, use colorful stickers and listen to animal sounds! Stickers and puzzles are logic games that foster the reasoning skills of your kid. Enjoy this challenge tailored for your children’s mind!

name: Math Tales The Farm
short_description: Help the farmer to find his animals and you will become the master of mathematics! You will learn about different colors, shapes and the numbers with a nursery rhyme and many fun games. Who said that learning should be boring?
long_description: Math Tales The Farm is a tale set on the farm with mathematical and logic mini-games for kids between 3 and 5 years old.  It is divided in 6 chapter, each one is connected to an animal. Each chapter presents 3 mini-games and it finish with the finding of a farm animal.  Accompanied by a narrative voice, your child will be transported into a fantastic world where he will learn about colors and numbers and will have to use logic in order to find all the animals!

name: Math Tales Friend
short_description: Math Tales Friends - Sue the Cow is a wonderful story for children aged between 3 and 5. With its funny interactive animations, colorful graphics and fun mini-games, this app is quite simply unique. Who said that learning should be boring?
long_description: Math Tales Friends - Sue the Cow is a fun interactive story to read and play. Accompanied by a narrator, your child can follow a fantastic story set on a farm. The main character in this episode is Sue, a sweet and sensitive cow, who tries to achieve her dream. She'll need your help to do so! Math Tales provides a new learning gaming experience you can share with your child. Don’t forget that your involvement will make it special.

name: Fun Jungle Animals
short_description: You’ll never get bored with the jungle animals! Many activities are waiting for you, 26 games with the 13 jungle animals. You can solve puzzles and use colorful stickers! Stickers and puzzles are logic games that foster the reasoning skills of your kid.
long_description: You’ll never get bored with the jungle animals! Many activities are waiting for you, 26 games with the 13 jungle animals. You can solve puzzles and use colorful stickers! Stickers and puzzles are logic games that foster the reasoning skills of your kid. Enjoy this challenge tailored for your children’s mind!

name: Whiskey the spider
short_description: Ready to play with Whiskey the Spider? Enjoy this wonderful, colorful, educational game! Have fun with your child and color Whiskey, dress him up in clothes, shoes and various hats, place stickers on the background and find hidden objects in the pictures!
long_description: The games help children prepare for a big future milestone: learning how to write and draw. Writing and drawing require hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills and all of these games help develop these skills in little learners. They will learn how to tidy objects up within an image, as well as color inside the lines and free hand. They will also have the chance of dressing up Whiskey, choosing from 30 outfits (sheriff, pirate, cook, etc.) and selecting their preferred setting. With Whiskey your child has fun, creates and learns!

name: Oddbods Ice Cream Fight
short_description: Battle your favourite Oddbods
long_description: The mischievous Oddbods are at it again! Throw delicious ice cream at them, before they throw back! This ice cream fight is getting wild! The Oddbods can duck, run left and right, and also appear out of nowhere to attack you. Features: - battle against different Oddbods such as Fuse, Bubbles, Pogo, Zee, Slick, Jeff and Newt. - boss levels with Fuse. He's a tough one to crack! - fun theme song - increasingly difficult challenges. Each Oddbod get smarter and faster over time.

name: Fill The Gap
short_description: Drag and drop pieces to score
long_description: Drag and drop pieces to fill gaps. Complete a row to score. Complete two or more rows to score points and get the bonus

name: Nom Nom Yum
short_description: Feed the hungry monster sushi
long_description: A hungry monster named Menmen loves sushi very much. Cut the rope and let the sushi slide in a mouthful mouth.

name: Pepperoni Gone Wild
short_description:
Mamma Mia! Your latest pizza creation turned into a GIANT pizza.

What's worse, it's rolling downhill.

Escape from the giant Pepperoni pizza before it crushes you!

Collect coins and perform cool acrobatic skills such as backflips and frontflips (because you can). Use the coins to unlock cool skills and new skins.

Features:

- Funny and relaxing pizza theme by the Italian countryside
- Challenging gameplay. It's easy to make a few jumps, but how far really can you travel
- Unlock more skins such as motorcycles, a funny car, a rolling lasagna and more pizza mayhem.
- Jump on to clouds too!

Compete with your friends for high scores. Leaderboard option available per request.
long_description:
Mamma Mia! Your latest pizza creation turned into a GIANT pizza.

What's worse, it's rolling downhill.

Escape from the giant Pepperoni pizza before it crushes you!

Collect coins and perform cool acrobatic skills such as backflips and frontflips (because you can). Use the coins to unlock cool skills and new skins.

Features:

- Funny and relaxing pizza theme by the Italian countryside
- Challenging gameplay. It's easy to make a few jumps, but how far really can you travel
- Unlock more skins such as motorcycles, a funny car, a rolling lasagna and more pizza mayhem.
- Jump on to clouds too!

Compete with your friends for high scores. Leaderboard option available per request.

name: Snowboard Hero
short_description:
Snowboard your way down the mountain, while avoiding the obstacles. Don't crash!

Features:

- Interactive tutorial. Anyone can play this game!
- Fast, pumping music suitable for X sports.
- Beautiful winter christmas landscape.
- Collect banners to earn extra points.

Fans of winter skifree xmas or snowboarding will love this game.
long_description:
Snowboard your way down the mountain, while avoiding the obstacles. Don't crash!

Features:

- Interactive tutorial. Anyone can play this game!
- Fast, pumping music suitable for X sports.
- Beautiful winter christmas landscape.
- Collect banners to earn extra points.

Fans of winter skifree xmas or snowboarding will love this game.

name: Shoot the Asteroids
short_description:
Navigate through a minefield of asteroids in your retro triangular ship.

Destroy asteroids and saucers to score points.

Use the teleport function to escape from sticky situations.

This game is great for sci-fi and retro game fans.

Features:

- Responsive design
- Works on desktop, mobile and tablet browsers
- Great retro sound effects
long_description:
Navigate through a minefield of asteroids in your retro triangular ship.

Destroy asteroids and saucers to score points.

Use the teleport function to escape from sticky situations.

This game is great for sci-fi and retro game fans.

Features:

- Responsive design
- Works on desktop, mobile and tablet browsers
- Great retro sound effects

name: Dumb Ways to Die 2 - The Games
short_description:
Dumb Ways to Die is back with a bigger and better sequel to the original.

In Dumb Ways To Die 2 - The Games, now you can access various maps and locations to try out even more fun and dangerous challenges.

Collect tokens to unlock different aspects of the city, while complete mini challenges perfectly (or imperfectly, depending on how you play). Score points to keep your ranking high.

Play in cool locations such as Adrenaland,  Drown Town, Dumbest of the Dumb, and Freezerville.

Features:

- Free daily tokens to unlock different maps
- Multiple mini challenges to keep you occupied for hours
- Very challenging levels
long_description:
Dumb Ways to Die is back with a bigger and better sequel to the original.

In Dumb Ways To Die 2 - The Games, now you can access various maps and locations to try out even more fun and dangerous challenges.

Collect tokens to unlock different aspects of the city, while complete mini challenges perfectly (or imperfectly, depending on how you play). Score points to keep your ranking high.

Play in cool locations such as Adrenaland,  Drown Town, Dumbest of the Dumb, and Freezerville.

Features:

- Free daily tokens to unlock different maps
- Multiple mini challenges to keep you occupied for hours
- Very challenging levels

name: Stupid Zombies 2
short_description:
The undead return in this new, jam-packed release of Stupid Zombies 2.

Select your character, and unleash your bullets at brainless zombies. They say you can’t kill what is already dead, but it can't hurt to do more damage.

Features:

- Multiple levels with multiple chapters
- Innovative ricochet based gameplay. Defeat the stupid zombies with brains and ingenuity.
- Realistic physics
- Zombie halloween theme
long_description:
The undead return in this new, jam-packed release of Stupid Zombies 2.

Select your character, and unleash your bullets at brainless zombies. They say you can’t kill what is already dead, but it can't hurt to do more damage.

Features:

- Multiple levels with multiple chapters
- Innovative ricochet based gameplay. Defeat the stupid zombies with brains and ingenuity.
- Realistic physics
- Zombie halloween theme

name: Oddbods Ice Cream Fight (Arabic)
short_description:
The mischievous Oddbods are at it again! Throw delicious ice cream at them, before they throw back! 

This ice cream fight is getting wild! The Oddbods can duck, run left and right, and also appear out of nowhere to attack you.

Features:

- battle against different Oddbods such as Fuse, Bubbles, Pogo,  Zee, Slick, Jeff and Newt.
- boss levels with Fuse. He's a tough one to crack!
- fun theme song
- increasingly difficult challenges. Each Oddbod get smarter and faster over time.

name: Catapultz.io
short_description:
Drag, aim and release! Launch your catapult at your opponents.

First to reach 20 kills wins the round. 

A fun and very fast-paced IO game, guaranteed to keep players coming back for more. 

Features:

- Simple tutorial to quickly learn how to play
- Fast gameplay
- Choose your own avatar and username
- Clever bots to balance the gameplay
- Play on any device
long_description:
Drag, aim and release! Launch your catapult at your opponents.

First to reach 20 kills wins the round. 

A fun and very fast-paced IO game, guaranteed to keep players coming back for more. 

Features:

- Simple tutorial to quickly learn how to play
- Fast gameplay
- Choose your own avatar and username
- Clever bots to balance the gameplay
- Play on any device

name: Pro Wrestling Action
short_description:
Get ready to rumble! Punch, kick, and wrestle your way through to be the last man standing.

Knock out your opponents, then throw them out of the ring!

Need to perform a spectacular feat? Climb the ropes, time your jumps and dive on the opponent.

Collect coins to upgrade your favourite wrestler in the shop.

Features:

- Simple controls to maximize fun. Start kicking and punching right away!
- Entertaining wrestling theme
- Clever and not so clever computer opponents. Just like on TV!
- Fight, collect coins, upgrade then fight again! Spend hours playing the game.
- Fill up your rage meter, and performing unstoppable RAGE attacks.

Fans of WWE, WCW, WWF and UFC will love the game.
long_description:
Get ready to rumble! Punch, kick, and wrestle your way through to be the last man standing.

Knock out your opponents, then throw them out of the ring!

Need to perform a spectacular feat? Climb the ropes, time your jumps and dive on the opponent.

Collect coins to upgrade your favourite wrestler in the shop.

Features:

- Simple controls to maximize fun. Start kicking and punching right away!
- Entertaining wrestling theme
- Clever and not so clever computer opponents. Just like on TV!
- Fight, collect coins, upgrade then fight again! Spend hours playing the game.
- Fill up your rage meter, and performing unstoppable RAGE attacks.

Fans of WWE, WCW, WWF and UFC will love the game.

name: Team Kaboom
short_description:
Attention soldier! Your goal is to blast enemies, and avoid getting killed. Avoid letting the enemies escape! If they escape, they'll come back faster and stronger.

Features:

- 3 different maps
- 5 cool characters. Each character holds a cool weapon. Rifles, machine guns, dynamites, knives, and oh, did we mention a rocket launcher?
- Fun pixel theme
- Intuitive controls for mobile and desktop
long_description:
Attention soldier! Your goal is to blast enemies, and avoid getting killed. Avoid letting the enemies escape! If they escape, they'll come back faster and stronger.

Features:

- 3 different maps
- 5 cool characters. Each character holds a cool weapon. Rifles, machine guns, dynamites, knives, and oh, did we mention a rocket launcher?
- Fun pixel theme
- Intuitive controls for mobile and desktop

name: Super Jump
short_description:
You are a super hero with a cool cape. Jump over rooftoops, while collecting powerups and avoiding obstacles.

Press and hold to control your jumping power.

Time your jumps with great care, to avoid falling.

Features:

Increasingly challenging gameplay
Avoid birds in later stages
Jump on changing rooftops
Collect invincibility potions and extra lives
Fans of superhero movies such as Superman will love this game
long_description:
You are a super hero with a cool cape. Jump over rooftoops, while collecting powerups and avoiding obstacles.

Press and hold to control your jumping power.

Time your jumps with great care, to avoid falling.

Features:

Increasingly challenging gameplay
Avoid birds in later stages
Jump on changing rooftops
Collect invincibility potions and extra lives
Fans of superhero movies such as Superman will love this game

name: Wham-O Slip 'N Slide Party
short_description:
The biggest Slip 'N Slide in Hawaii. Jump on it, and start sliding away!

Switch lanes, jump and slide, while avoiding obstacles such as road blocks and cars.

Collect coins and coconuts. Use coins to purchase cool swag from the store, such as Scuba Diving gear, rocket pack, hand paddles and swimming floats! 

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- First person 3D-like view
- Fun Hawaiian theme and music
- Easy and intuitive controls
- Extremely good looking surfer guy
- Endless gameplay
- A shop with items to unlock

Note: The desktop version uses keyboard controls. The mobile version uses easy touch/drag controls.
long_description:
The biggest Slip 'N Slide in Hawaii. Jump on it, and start sliding away!

Switch lanes, jump and slide, while avoiding obstacles such as road blocks and cars.

Collect coins and coconuts. Use coins to purchase cool swag from the store, such as Scuba Diving gear, rocket pack, hand paddles and swimming floats! 

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- First person 3D-like view
- Fun Hawaiian theme and music
- Easy and intuitive controls
- Extremely good looking surfer guy
- Endless gameplay
- A shop with items to unlock

Note: The desktop version uses keyboard controls. The mobile version uses easy touch/drag controls.

name: Knife Dart
short_description:
Practice makes perfect. Take aim at the tree bark, and throw knives one by one.

Be careful to only throw knives at empty spots.

How many points can you score?

Features:

- Endless gameplay. Literally, practise for hours.
- Fun arcade-like theme
- Increasingly challenging levels
- Use coins to unlock cool knives in the store

Fans of dart and sports games will love this.  It's a perfect game for competitive gameplay with leaderboards.
long_description:
Practice makes perfect. Take aim at the tree bark, and throw knives one by one.

Be careful to only throw knives at empty spots.

How many points can you score?

Features:

- Endless gameplay. Literally, practise for hours.
- Fun arcade-like theme
- Increasingly challenging levels
- Use coins to unlock cool knives in the store

Fans of dart and sports games will love this.  It's a perfect game for competitive gameplay with leaderboards.

name: Santa Airlines
short_description:
21st century Santa now delivers presents via his Skybus DEC25. Help Santa navigate the skies with his cool airplane.

Collect presents, boosters and rescue kids along the way. Naughty or nice, find out yourself!

Features:


 christmas theme
 cool santa in pilot attire
 cloud obstacles
 interactive tutorial
 extremely easy and intuitive touch controls
 cool collectibles and power ups. Time to get this xmas party started!
long_description:
21st century Santa now delivers presents via his Skybus DEC25. Help Santa navigate the skies with his cool airplane.

Collect presents, boosters and rescue kids along the way. Naughty or nice, find out yourself!

Features:


 christmas theme
 cool santa in pilot attire
 cloud obstacles
 interactive tutorial
 extremely easy and intuitive touch controls
 cool collectibles and power ups. Time to get this xmas party started!

name: Jump and Splat
short_description:
Tap to slam the ball down. Keep bouncing as far as you can.

Time your jumps to ensure safe landing. The perfect, endless platformer game!

Features:

- Beautiful, minimalist 3D graphics
- Endless game, perfect for high score and competitions
- Full Responsive design
- Full screen option
long_description:
Tap to slam the ball down. Keep bouncing as far as you can.

Time your jumps to ensure safe landing. The perfect, endless platformer game!

Features:

- Beautiful, minimalist 3D graphics
- Endless game, perfect for high score and competitions
- Full Responsive design
- Full screen option

name: Climb the Rocks
short_description:
Wait for the right moment to grab the next rock. 

Climb one rock at a time. Avoid unstable rocks, while keeping an eye at the prize.

Can you conquer Mount Narya?  

Features:

- Feeling strong like Rocky? Try other more challenging mountains such as Mount Kibar, Alru, Chota, Ordh and Ucca. 
- Endless gameplay
- Collect diamonds to unlock new mountain climbing characters.
- Challenging outdoor environment
- Great theme and music
long_description:
Wait for the right moment to grab the next rock. 

Climb one rock at a time. Avoid unstable rocks, while keeping an eye at the prize.

Can you conquer Mount Narya?  

Features:

- Feeling strong like Rocky? Try other more challenging mountains such as Mount Kibar, Alru, Chota, Ordh and Ucca. 
- Endless gameplay
- Collect diamonds to unlock new mountain climbing characters.
- Challenging outdoor environment
- Great theme and music

name: Stupid Zombies
short_description:
One man, one shotgun and a whole lot of zombies. You are humanity's last hope, and it's your job to keep them brainless.

Adjust your shots and angles, and you watch your bullets ricochet from wall to wall, elegantly picking off each zombie's arms and limbs.

Features:

- 4 giant stages with over 360 challenging levels
- Exciting zombie theme
- Simple and innovative ricochet based gameplay. Defeat the stupid zombies with brains and ingenuity.
- Realistic physics
- Great zombie soundtrack
long_description:
One man, one shotgun and a whole lot of zombies. You are humanity's last hope, and it's your job to keep them brainless.

Adjust your shots and angles, and you watch your bullets ricochet from wall to wall, elegantly picking off each zombie's arms and limbs.

Features:

- 4 giant stages with over 360 challenging levels
- Exciting zombie theme
- Simple and innovative ricochet based gameplay. Defeat the stupid zombies with brains and ingenuity.
- Realistic physics
- Great zombie soundtrack

name: Fishing With Friends
short_description:
A real-time multiplayer game where you go deep water fishing with your friends.

Take aim and fire your harpoon to catch the fish. Unlock special powerups such as Rapid Fire, Exploding Net, and Ocean Vortex.

Who will emerge the winner at the end of this multiplayer fishing game?

Features:

- Extremely simple controls
- 2 minute gameplay, perfect for casual rounds
- 4 players in a room
- Unlimited rooms
- Customize your nickname and avatar
- Score combos and unlock special powerups. Open the ocean vortex to catch additional fish.
long_description:
A real-time multiplayer game where you go deep water fishing with your friends.

Take aim and fire your harpoon to catch the fish. Unlock special powerups such as Rapid Fire, Exploding Net, and Ocean Vortex.

Who will emerge the winner at the end of this multiplayer fishing game?

Features:

- Extremely simple controls
- 2 minute gameplay, perfect for casual rounds
- 4 players in a room
- Unlimited rooms
- Customize your nickname and avatar
- Score combos and unlock special powerups. Open the ocean vortex to catch additional fish.

name: Kill The Spy
short_description:
Armed with your trusty pistol, it's up to you, Agent 007 to eliminate the enemy spy agents.

Tap on the correct blocks to eliminate the spy agents. Use the least amount of moves to earn more stars.

Do not hard the hostages, or else the mission will fail.

Features:

- Innovative physics and game mechanics. Aim your spy pistol to split structures into multiple pieces
- Collect treasures to increase your score
- Place your shots correctly to earn more stars
- Spy theme and  sound effects

Fans of James Bond , Men in Black and spy themed novels will love this game.
long_description:
Armed with your trusty pistol, it's up to you, Agent 007 to eliminate the enemy spy agents.

Tap on the correct blocks to eliminate the spy agents. Use the least amount of moves to earn more stars.

Do not hard the hostages, or else the mission will fail.

Features:

- Innovative physics and game mechanics. Aim your spy pistol to split structures into multiple pieces
- Collect treasures to increase your score
- Place your shots correctly to earn more stars
- Spy theme and  sound effects

Fans of James Bond , Men in Black and spy themed novels will love this game.

name: Airplane Survival
short_description:
Drag and steer your airplane away from the enemy missiles.

Beware of enemy missiles with homing abilities. Stay clear, time your evasions and plan ahead.

Features:

- Collect powerups such as boost, ring protection and nuclear damage to extend your chances of survival
- Use the fever mode to your advantage
- Gain achievements by playing longer
- Great music and ambience
- Unlock cool aircraft with your high scores
- Innovative gameplay. Play for hours, trying to beat your previous best score
long_description:
Drag and steer your airplane away from the enemy missiles.

Beware of enemy missiles with homing abilities. Stay clear, time your evasions and plan ahead.

Features:

- Collect powerups such as boost, ring protection and nuclear damage to extend your chances of survival
- Use the fever mode to your advantage
- Gain achievements by playing longer
- Great music and ambience
- Unlock cool aircraft with your high scores
- Innovative gameplay. Play for hours, trying to beat your previous best score

name: Muay Thai Training
short_description:
You wish to become the greatest muay thai fighter of all time? Start with banana trees.

Punch, kick and knee your way to score points. Just like how Buakaw does it in Thailand.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Simple tap gameplay
- Unlock advanced characters Shaolin and James
- Kickboxing or Thai inspired music for martial arts fans
long_description:
You wish to become the greatest muay thai fighter of all time? Start with banana trees.

Punch, kick and knee your way to score points. Just like how Buakaw does it in Thailand.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Simple tap gameplay
- Unlock advanced characters Shaolin and James
- Kickboxing or Thai inspired music for martial arts fans

name: Ant Smash
short_description:
These ants are everywhere!

Stop them before they reach your last line of defense.

How many points can you score?

Features:

- Fast paced action. 
- Smash ants, bugs and all other scary things.
- Random and coordinated ant movement. Test your smashing skills.
- Avoid the nasty fly at all costs.
long_description:
These ants are everywhere!

Stop them before they reach your last line of defense.

How many points can you score?

Features:

- Fast paced action. 
- Smash ants, bugs and all other scary things.
- Random and coordinated ant movement. Test your smashing skills.
- Avoid the nasty fly at all costs.

name: X-Trench Run
short_description:
Avoid obstacles and take out the turrets in this space simulation game. 

As the nation's star cadet, fly your x fighter wing deep into the enemy trench, disable enemy laser gates and hunt the boss. 

It's up to you to win this space war! Stay on course, don't crash, and use your intuition! 

Features:

- Endless mode with increasing difficulty
- Highly repetitive five star gameplay. Every round is different
- Exciting boss fights. Earn your stars and stripes.
- Fast and energetic music
- Mobile and desktop friendly controls
long_description:
Avoid obstacles and take out the turrets in this space simulation game. 

As the nation's star cadet, fly your x fighter wing deep into the enemy trench, disable enemy laser gates and hunt the boss. 

It's up to you to win this space war! Stay on course, don't crash, and use your intuition! 

Features:

- Endless mode with increasing difficulty
- Highly repetitive five star gameplay. Every round is different
- Exciting boss fights. Earn your stars and stripes.
- Fast and energetic music
- Mobile and desktop friendly controls

name: Stickman Swing
short_description:
Tap to hook. Swing and make incredible jumps.

Execute crazy acrobatic tricks like a stickman boss. Avoid obstacles at all costs.

Features:

- Simple controls and fun gameplay.
- Unlimited levels! Play forever.
- Swing like spider man stick edition.
- Funky urban theme.
- Grappling hooks and bouncers included.
long_description:
Tap to hook. Swing and make incredible jumps.

Execute crazy acrobatic tricks like a stickman boss. Avoid obstacles at all costs.

Features:

- Simple controls and fun gameplay.
- Unlimited levels! Play forever.
- Swing like spider man stick edition.
- Funky urban theme.
- Grappling hooks and bouncers included.

name: Banana Running
short_description:
Play as Mr. Nanners, the funniest banana in town with a unique voice. 

Unfortunately, Mrs. Nanners is missing, and it's your job to find her in this endless runner.

Run along the city streets in your quest to find Mrs. Nanners. Slide left, right, and under obstacles while collecting Mrs Nanners dolls. 

Don't forget to collect Banana Balls, and use them to upgrade your gear.

Features:

- Funny banana theme.
- Funny banana jokes with voiceover dialogues.
- Interactive tutorial.
- Increasingly challenging difficulty as you embark on this endless runner.
- Upgrade your gear. Mr. Nanners can ride cool skateboards, Segways, hoverboards and even a rocket pack!
long_description:
Play as Mr. Nanners, the funniest banana in town with a unique voice. 

Unfortunately, Mrs. Nanners is missing, and it's your job to find her in this endless runner.

Run along the city streets in your quest to find Mrs. Nanners. Slide left, right, and under obstacles while collecting Mrs Nanners dolls. 

Don't forget to collect Banana Balls, and use them to upgrade your gear.

Features:

- Funny banana theme.
- Funny banana jokes with voiceover dialogues.
- Interactive tutorial.
- Increasingly challenging difficulty as you embark on this endless runner.
- Upgrade your gear. Mr. Nanners can ride cool skateboards, Segways, hoverboards and even a rocket pack!

name: Spore Hunter
short_description:
Tap and hold to attack the incoming space spores.

You only have 3 lives.

Features:

- Cool space theme
- Tap to repair your ship
- Collect powerups to boost your score
long_description:
Tap and hold to attack the incoming space spores.

You only have 3 lives.

Features:

- Cool space theme
- Tap to repair your ship
- Collect powerups to boost your score

name: 3D Bottle Shooter
short_description:
Aim and shoot glass bottles. It's so simple, yet so addictive. 

Listen to the harmonic sounds of glass shattering amidst the peaceful countryside.

Aim for 3 stars in each level.

Features:

- Over 30 challenging levels
- Serene and peaceful countryside vibe
- Simple controls for the casual user
- Beautiful, low-poly gun, countryside, trees and mountains.
long_description:
Aim and shoot glass bottles. It's so simple, yet so addictive. 

Listen to the harmonic sounds of glass shattering amidst the peaceful countryside.

Aim for 3 stars in each level.

Features:

- Over 30 challenging levels
- Serene and peaceful countryside vibe
- Simple controls for the casual user
- Beautiful, low-poly gun, countryside, trees and mountains.

name: Monster Truck Driving
short_description:
Control your monster truck to reach the flag. 

Boost, brake and tilt your truck left/right to navigate the path.

Earn stars by completing the level in record time.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Use stars to unlock cool characters such as a cool flaming truck, Batman truck, Shark truck, Hyena truck and more.
- Panning function to plan your routes
- 20 challenging levels
- Play repeatedly to get the best high score
- Upbeat theme

Monster Truck and Dirt Bike enthusiasts will love this game.
long_description:
Control your monster truck to reach the flag. 

Boost, brake and tilt your truck left/right to navigate the path.

Earn stars by completing the level in record time.

Features:

- Interactive tutorial
- Use stars to unlock cool characters such as a cool flaming truck, Batman truck, Shark truck, Hyena truck and more.
- Panning function to plan your routes
- 20 challenging levels
- Play repeatedly to get the best high score
- Upbeat theme

Monster Truck and Dirt Bike enthusiasts will love this game.

name: Wasteland Warriors Capture The Flag
short_description:
Introducing our brand new, 4v4 MOBA real time multiplayer game. 

Pick your sides, grab your weapons and start shooting. Capture the flag for massive points.

Use health packs to heal, hide behind structures to avoid the bullets.

Can you top the leaderboards?

Features:

- Easy and intuitive controls, for desktop and mobile (smartphones and tablets). Start fragging immediately
- Emoji support in nicknames. Use http://getemoji.com and paste into nickname field.
- Clever bot AI
- Post apocalyptic battle environment with various obstacles
- Collect health packs to survive
- Collect rocketpacks to boost your firing rate
- Competitive leaderboard for each round
long_description:
Introducing our brand new, 4v4 MOBA real time multiplayer game. 

Pick your sides, grab your weapons and start shooting. Capture the flag for massive points.

Use health packs to heal, hide behind structures to avoid the bullets.

Can you top the leaderboards?

Features:

- Easy and intuitive controls, for desktop and mobile (smartphones and tablets). Start fragging immediately
- Emoji support in nicknames. Use http://getemoji.com and paste into nickname field.
- Clever bot AI
- Post apocalyptic battle environment with various obstacles
- Collect health packs to survive
- Collect rocketpacks to boost your firing rate
- Competitive leaderboard for each round
